column1: 126kph, good length, leg stump, tucked straight to forward square leg in the ring
beaten, 129kph, good length, swinging away and beats the edge as he drives with no footwork
128kph, back of a length, across him, he pushes firmly with the vertical bat to point
128kph, good length, middle and leg line, worked to a man at a very square midwicket
swing and a miss. This was fuller, he tried to thump it down the ground but it nipped off the seam through to the keeper
shorter length, bunts a short arm pull shot to deep square who had dropped to the rope for the last ball
full on off, 138kph, driven back to the bowler
138kph, shorter length on leg, worked wide of mid on for an easy one
136kph, good length, he tried to turn to leg but got a leading edge that falls safely close on the off side
wide of the crease, 139kph, angled to middle, he clips this nicely with the angle wide of mid on for a couple
back of a length, 138kph, on off, he knocks this to the gap at midwicket
136kph,another swing and a miss, good length angled across and swinging further away and he misses a drive on the up
129kph, good length, wide of off, he drives off the stickers of the bat to cover in the ring
129kph, good length, holds up a touch, he's back and punching to cover with no timing
119kph, slower outswinger, perfect length outside off, he defends on the front foot
118kph, short ball, pulls with not great timing behind square and the sweeper has to run around and cut it off
129kph, punches off the back foot to mid off but mistimes completely and he's able to get an easy given it was hit so slowly to him
finally pulls one away behind square! Fractionally short into the ribs and he swings this around behind square and it races to the rope
Dropped by Kohli at cover! He hammered this drive so hard on the up, Kohli was quite close and it burst through his hands and into his cap, and away for a single
144kph, full into the pads, squeezes off the edge onto pad and rolls away into the leg side
crunched straight of mid on! It was overpitched and he drives through the line, doesn't nail but hits it straight of mid on and beats the man
good length, 142kph, thick inside edged runs wide of short fine leg and races away! That was a good delivery unrewarded
swing and a miss. Good length outside off, some extra bounce beats the edge as he drives on the up
139kph, thick edge fine of third man, no slips in, Finch races back taking on the throw and dives and makes it easily as the throw is well wide

caught at mid on running back! Brilliant catch from Kuldeep. It was a good length, off stump, he lofted this very high, got underneath it, it sailed back over the bowler's head, Kuldeep ran back and held a superb catch!
good length, across him he drives and drags a thick inside edge through square leg
drives on the up through cover-point! Classy shot this. Good length and he plays a classical square drive on the up. Lovely way to start from Lynn
good length, angled into leg, tucks him up, he defends with the full face back to the bowler
132kph, shorter into the hip, he turns this away nicely behind square
129kph, good length, middle and leg, turned away on the front foot through square leg
leg glance fine for four! This is full and swinging down leg and he glances this easily past fine leg who is inside the circle
132kph, good length, off stump, drives nicely to straight mid on and runs with the stroke
huge swing and miss. Back of a length on off and he lined this up and tried to launch over long on but misses
122kph, back of a length slower ball, he chops it off the bottom half of the bat back onto the pitch
good length, 134kph, heaved away along the ground to deep square leg
132kph, angled into the pads, tucked through midwicket
full toss, swept hard to deep backward square
quicker on leg, tucked off the back foot to deep square
tossed up, full toss, driven along the ground to long off
tossed up on leg, he drives along the ground to long on
wrong un, he sweeps but misses, big appeal from Rohit at slip but it was spinning well past off
tossed up on leg, clipped straight to midwicket in the ring
launches high over midwicket and it goes all the way! Length ball in the slot and Lynn lofts this very high and it falls just over the rope!
133kph, tries to go again and misses! He swung so hard at this. There was a woosh of the bat as he missed it
short into leg stump again, he heaves this away with the swing wide of fine leg and they get two
launched into the upper deck over square leg! Goodness what a strike! This was a shorter length in the arc and it disappeared into the top deck of the stand at square leg. Magnificent hit
short arm jab over straight long on! Fuller length and he punches with the bottom hand through the line and it sails straight of long on
short and wide and cut hard out to deep cover to the sweeper
tossed up on off, pushed on the front foot into the gap at cover
attempted reverse sweep, hit on the pad, an appeal, not out, hit outside the line of off

caught at backward point! Brilliant from Kuldeep. He tossed up the wrong un, Finch advances and doesn't get to the pitch, swings hard against the spin, gets a thick outside edge that flies all the way to the man at backward point who takes an easy catch. Great bowling
tossed up outside off, driven hard straight of deep cover-point for an easy two
wrong un, he prods it into the off side, not sure he picked it, but they pinch a single
wrong un, pitched on middle and leg, he defends into the off side
92kph, full on off, he defends into the off side
tossed up, on off, defended to cover
shorter into leg stump, he tucks this to square leg
advances to the pitch and launches this straight to the sightscreen! Great footwork to get down and loft through the line
skips down, he darts it shorter and defends to cover
wider of off, hammered to deep cover-point

lobs it straight back! Lynn goes too hard at a loopy length ball that goes straight on. He's put in a stride but isn't anywhere near the pitch of that as he tries to get the single at long-off. Soft way to end an innings of hard hitting
nicely done. Full ball outside off, gets low and the stride across off to dab this fine
but Stoinis has the last laugh! Stays tall, watches this seam-up quicker one come on at thigh height and ramps it fine. Kuldeep admonishes himself
length outside off, looks to play the reverse sweep and gets it off the leading edge. Pitch side on the off side
length. A googly at off stump. Nudged to extra cover on the up
short outside off, chopped to sweeper cover
full and pushed quickly down leg side
full on middle stump, driven to long-on
length at middle stump, tapped through the open mid-on region with soft hands
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper's left
length ball in at leg stump. Backs away and heaves at it to get it out to deep midwicket off the inside half

Stoinis reviews an lbw decision. It looked very out live. Length ball angled in but going on with the arm as he looked to play the reverse sweep. Trapped in front of middle stump. Is there height on that to save Stoinis? There's no bat...yes there is height. That's going over leg.
length on leg stump, tapped to long-on off the back foot
short ball rising up to rib height, but it's well down leg side

missed run-out chance. Length ball at off stump, dropped in front of point with soft hands. KL Rahul swoops down on it and takes some time before throwing at the non-striker's end. Maxwell a long way down. Looked Rahul was caught between going direct and lobbing it back to the bowler who was still backtracking
length outside off, chopped to extra cover
short at the hips, backs away and swipes it over midwicket. No one in the deep and Stoinis shows awareness once again
bouncer dug in too short. Flies high above his right shoulder as he looks to ramp this
misfield by Kohli at deep midwicket. Length ball tapped in front of him with soft hands and he can't get his hands around it after sprinting a long way in
length outside off, dropped into the covers with soft hands
drilled straight over the bowler. Stunning hit. It's full on middle stump, he shuffles a touch and creams it. Capitalising on Khaleel's nerves
length at leg stump, dragged wide of long-on with the slog
second tier. Krunal drops it short at a leg stump line and Maxwell gets deep in the crease and pumps it high over deep midwicket!
and another! This is too easy for Maxwell. Flat, fast, length, no turn. Skids on nicely for him to swing from under it and clear long-on
three in three! Another length ball pushed in fast and yet again, he gets the front leg out of the way and swipes at it. Wider of long-on this time
fires in a yorker at leg stump and he stands tall to tickle this behind square with soft hands
full at leg stump, tapped to long-on
front-of-the-hand faster one from Kuldeep. Signs of nerves? It's short and down leg side and he sways away from it
length at middle stump, backs away and carves it wide of sweeper cover
length at leg stump, gets out the reverse-sweep and swats it along the floor to sweeper
googly at a length, squaring him up and forcing him to defend in front of off
full at off stump, backs away and drives to long-off
length ball down leg side, past the attempted flick
length ball pushed flat at off stump, punched to extra cover
quicker one at a length on leg stump. Stays back and hurriedly jabs it wide of the bowler to steal a second from long-on
length ball pushed in flat at leg stump. Same old, same old! Stoinis the beneficiary. Front leg out of the way and a swipe from under to clear deep midwicket
yorker length at leg stump, jammed out to long-on's right
pushes this one wide outside off as Stoinis backs away. He's too far from it to play a stroke. Leaves it alone
full and fast on leg stump, nudged to long-on off the toe-end
the railings of the second-tier. Krunal is coming apart. Goes seam up and gets a full toss up at thigh height for Maxwell. Pummels it over midwicket
full and into the pads. Skewed wide of long-on off the toe-end

dropped at third man. Khaleel draws the fury of Bumrah. Short ball outside off, chops from under it to try and get it fine but he's sent this straight to Khaleel. He hasn't had to move, but that bursts through his hand. Seems like he was caught off-guard. Bumrah roars in anger

drags it straight to square leg. It's possible he's picked the offcutter here, but it's at such an awkward length that he has no control. Hands a long way out as he goes after this and finds the only fielder in the circle
full toss on middle stump, looks to power this over midwicket but that's too quick for him. Lobs over the bowler off the high part of the bat and they get two as a result of the poor connection
well bowled. Beats him completely. Slower ball at a length outside off, too early into the shot and he's just ended up swatting air
short of a length slower ball outside off, and he's beaten yet again. Swings at it. They steal a bye
yorker at leg stump, jammed in front of long-on off the toe-end and they steal two
136kph, swinging into the pads and he eases this with glorious timing through square midwicket
134kph, half volley and a beautiful cover drive! Lovely footwork, flowing bat through the line and past cover and it races away
134kph, back of a length, nipping back, hits him on the thigh and drops into the off side
french cut for four! Great delivery, nips off the seam from a good length, he prods in defence, gets a thick inside edge that flies past leg stump and fine for four
beaten, back of a length, fifth stump line, nipping away, he tries to force off the back foot and misses
beaten again good length, swinging away, he defends inside the line and it goes past the edge
138kph, back of a length, off stump, he defends from the crease
141kph, back of a length, run off the open face down to third man
short ball down leg, he hooks and misses, there's a big appeal from Maxwell from point but no one else went up. Called wide. He missed it by miles
fuller length, driven firmly straight to mid off
slashed hard past backward point! Fractionally short and wide and he threw his hands through it and it raced off the blade past Maxwell's dive at backward point and away to the rope
142kph, back of a length, defended close into the off side with soft hands and they pinch one. Good running and great hands to knock it down
good length, fifth stump line, defended to point
swing and miss, this was a tempter outside off, and it nipped back in, drives hard and it beats the inside edge but it was wide of off stump
skips down and checks a drive down straight of mid off! Superb control. He skipped down the track to the pitch and hit a controlled check drive, lofted straight of mid off
opens the face and runs fine of third man, big Billy Stanlake runs around and makes a diving save! Great effort
lofted just over the head of Tye running back from mid on! Very full, he tried to whip square but scooped it just over the man running back
he charges, banged in back of a length, he gives room and cuts straight to backward point
advances, he saw him coming, bangs it in, jams him into the hip, he tucks it around the corner
short and pulled behind square! Hip height length and he swivelled and smashed it behind square, one bounce four
145kph, back of a length outside off, he chops down through the vacant slips to third man
142kph, good length, middle stump, he defends on the front foot
shorter length, he ramps it, he steps inside it and flips it, but doesn't get it, fine leg is up, it just goes fine of him and they get a couple
short ball, hooked, not controlled, it just falls short of McDermott running in! The Aussies did forecast that uncontrolled hook shot and it nearly did the trick
good length, middle, defended into the off side

caught by Finch running back from mid on! He skips down and tries to loft over the on side, scoops a leading edge high back over the bowler's head, Finch runs back gets very close to it but hugs it to his chest! It bobbled a moment but he held on
short and wide and late cut to third man
131kph, good length on middle, he's back and across, tucks behind square
back of a length, he punches off the back foot hard to cover-point
130kph, short down leg, he pulls fine for four! This was a bad ball. He swivelled and pulled it fine, it just fell short of the rope
132kph, short and wide and cut hard but straight to point
115kph, slower ball, knuckle ball variety, full on off, driven to long on
133kph, on speed, short and wide, slashed in the air for a long way it doesn't carry to third man
shorter length, on off, he defends with soft hands into the off side and they pinch one
skips down the track and lofts it straight to the sightscreen! This was a 115kph slower ball, he skipped down and held his shape hitting it straight down the ground, it just pitched short of the rope

edged just past the keeper! Cross seam, back of a length outside off, he tried to glide it to third man, extra bounce caught the edge but it was thick enough to go just past the outstretched glove of Carey and away to the rope
full toss, driven hard to mid off on the ring
nudged with the turn to midwicket
short and wide, dragged down, he cuts hard past backward point! Well placed
nudged to midwicket, no one in the ring, they run two brilliantly
stumping chance, he swung at a cut after pressing forward, Carey whips the bails off but he had his foot down
tossed up, driven with the spin to cover-point
pushed through quicker, he's back and punching down to long on
yorker length, squeezes it out through cover point to the sweeper
flicked over backward square into the crowd! This was into the pads and with the angle he just picked it up and flicked it flat and over backward square and it carried the fence
half-volley, cracks a drive past cover and it races to the rope, McDermott slides and saves but they get two. Fifty for Dhawan! Superb innings this
slices a drive in the air but straight between cover and mid off! This wasn't flushed, on the up, but he picked the gap and it raced away
133kph, full toss outside off, mistimed to cover. He misses out there
charges and gets to it on the full and smokes a drive straight down the ground to the sightscreen! Brilliant from Dhawan

the bails have lit up as he goes back for the cut but he seems to have got the shot away anyway. This will be checked. Was it Carey's gloves? Yes it is. They get a single at backward point. That will be a no-ball too.
full on off stump, clears the front leg and lofts it wide of long-off with a mistimed inside-out drive

stumping appeal sent upstairs. KL Rahul is driving inside the line of a googly, well outside off. Away from the body. He has overbalanced and his foot is on the line before the close-ups...and the close-ups reveal no part of the sole is behind the line. Quick hands from Carey after Rahul is done by the loop.
full on leg stump, whipped straight to midwicket
length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
length at middle stump, drilled back down the pitch and bursts through Zampa's hands low to his right
length outside off, swats at it as it keeps sliding away. Thick outside edge past short third man
length at middle stump, allows it to come on and nudges it to deep square
length outside off, steps out and slaps it on the up to long-off's right. Fielder over-runs it three but manages to keep it in by sticking out his left hand
slower ball at a length on off stump, dropped into the covers with soft hands
into the mid-riff as this skids under his pull shot. Short of a length ball into the side of his stomach and deflects to Carey's right
slower short all at middle. Drags the pull to deep square
bouncer dug in too short, ducks under it

falls short of Stanlake at wide third man. Length ball wide outside off and he chucks his hands at this. Once again, seems to have misjudged the pace of it and is through it early. Slices high to the fielder's right
full and wide outside off, beaten on the drive

dropped! Oh that's a sitter. Length ball outside off, beats him in the flight and gets him to jab with hard hands. It floats back to him and he loses his balance to the left as he crouches with the reverse-cup
length outside off, steps out and drives to long-off
length outside off, looks to slog sweep, comes off the inside half to midwicket

taken at short third man! Zampa applies the squeeze on Kohli - 1 run off 5 balls - and has him swatting with no shape under this length ball. Looks like a topspinner. Gets big on Kohli, although he wasn't close to the pitch of that to start with after stepping out. Gets a top edge and it is pouched
length outside off, slices to sweeper cover
short of a length on the pads, tickled to fine leg off the back foot
swats this away! This is nicely done. He has Stanlake figured. Rocks back, gets under the bounce and helps it along over square leg
drops short of the fielder at fine leg. Short of a length delivery at leg stump, stays in the crease and ramps it upwards. Fine leg dives to his right and can't quite get it

ramps straight to third man. Bouncer at a middle stump line. Backs away and uses the pace. Not a bad ploy, but he's found the fielder at the boundary. Another top innings from Dhawan to follow the last one against West Indies, but is this the game for Australia?
bouncer dropped too short and well down leg side. Leaves it alone
slower ball at a length on leg stump, looks to swipe into the leg side, cops it on the thigh
short of a length outside off, runs it down to third man's left
yorker length at off stump, jammed back down the pitch
googly at a length on leg stump, slogs at it and cops it on the thigh
long-on pushes it back in after sprinting to his left. Length at middle stump, pulls aerially but it's miscued and doesn't have the legs to beat the fielders converging on it
googly bowled full outside off, drilled firmly but straight to long-off
full toss outside off, mistimed slog off the toe-end to deep midwicket
a single to extra cover's left. Pant walks down at this but has to adjust to the googly. Can only tap it there.
clears fine leg! What hands. It takes some doing with his backlift to hit from under the ball. But that's what he's done. It's length, it's climbing up at his thigh, but he just ramps this
pumped! Full at leg stump, gets the front foot out of the way and pummels it between long-on and deep midwicket
follows him down leg with a bouncer but it's called wide as he beats him
short at middle stump, mistimed pull out to deep midwicket
full outside off, check-drives to sweeper's right
length and very very wide outside off. Left alone
outside edge! And flying past Carey. Full ball outside off, looks to smoke this through cover but that ball slides away off the surface to get the outside edge

Maxwell leaps to catch outside the boundary but can't chuck the ball back in before he lands on the floor! This is a full toss, Karthik slaps it to deep midwicket's left. Maxwell is running diagonally back to his left and with that angle, he can only end up over the rope somehow. To counter it, he leaps to catch and tries to flick it back, but he can't quite manage it. India get 25 off the over
sliced to third man's left. Slower ball bowled wide at a length, he looks to slap through cover, ends up carving it
length outside off, seems to be a knuckle ball. Hammers it to long-on's left with a flat bat

beats backward square to the right! Poor ball, but expertly put away. He was tangled there briefly because he had walked down. But it was a slower ball and he had time to swivel and pull this while he was still on the move. Swatted it, and the dive wouldn't do it in the deep
outside edge short of short third man. Slower ball outside off, looks to drive on the up, it gets big on him

full toss above waist height! This is disintegration. Looks for the wide yorker, seemingly. It's very wide and is called that first, before the umpire looks to his left and sees the leg umpire signal no-ball
slower ball, short of a length outside off. Mistimed slap on the up to long-off
slower ball at a length outside off, square drive to sweeper's right
well wide of long-off. Stunning placement. He finally nails a cover drive after a couple of edges. Slower ball, full outside off, gets to the pitch and in control as he drives firmly
length ball wide outside off, left alone. Walked a couple of steps into the off side, it was still too wide
length at the stumps, clipped to the deep midwicket region

taken at point! Pant looks for the reverse scoop and it's the second time in recent memory that he's been out playing that. It was bowled last time, it's a skier for point this time. Third man and two point fielders were in, the shot was on. But he got this full toss off the toe-end. Is there drama left still?!

off his helmet. Tye with the bouncer first up and Pandya is in a terrible position for the hook. This flies off the BCCI logo on his helmet. He's on his feet though and they complete the single at square leg
misses a short and wide ball! That was there for the taking. He swatted right under it.

but he finishes what looked like a decent over with a four! Top class. Just top class slog-overs batting from Karthik. He knows the field and he's going to hit it wherever he wants. Walks across this time, gets the overpitched ball with a stride and drills it, almost half a sweep, to long-on's right. It races away, he has no chance
slides back in. Completes the second run. Slower ball short of a length delivery wide outside off. Shuffles and wants to pull through midwicket. It's off the toe and to long-on's left
beaten! Oh this is close. So close. Full toss wide outside off and it's past the wide marker, but Krunal has shuffled and that is in his arc. It won't be called a wide

Maxwell with the stunner! Stoinis with a nervous smirk, but he's done superbly to make this wicket. A slower ball, pitching outside off and zipping away. Means Krunal will not connect with the slog sweep. It lobs some 15 yards in front of long-on and Maxwell sprints in, slides, and takes it inches off the floor. Then he gets up and roars. That's a man trying to prove something.

finds long-off! There is life in this Australian bowling still. Stoinis sticks to his strategy of slower ones despite the caning last over. Drops it short of length outside off, gives him no pace as he walks down and all he can do is slap it, flat, straight to Behdrendorff. Dinesh KArthik won't take India home today, but he's brought them to the gate
called wide! A slower bouncer. Bhuvneshwar jumps down the track and has a heave at it. It is too high.
can only get one. Short of a length and rising up outside off. Swats again, makes connection, but it plonks to long-on's right
Australia have hung on. Not a bad shot first ball from Kuldeep - walks into the off side and ramps it over short fine.
